dict.acceptation: 一次，一趟；一倍；曾经；一旦；

sent.orig: Jeff: World champion Frenchman Roland Yalabot and his ONCE team dropped out.
sent.trans: 杰夫：世界排名第一的自行车选手法国人罗兰·亚拉博特和他所在的ONCE车队一起退出了大赛。

sent.orig: Once completed, you can paint, varnish, stain or leave a natural wood!
sent.trans: Once完成，你可以油漆，清漆，染色或留下天然木材！

sent.orig: Once the yangzi-delta, once the full field, once the east Asia, has become the past.
sent.trans: 曾经的民不聊生，曾经的满野战乱，曾经的东亚病夫，都已成了过去。

sent.orig: Once the Council have given us the all-clear the builders will start at once.
sent.trans: 一旦理事会批准了，就马上开始修建工作。

sent.orig: Once naive, once bitter and astringent. Good-bye muddled when one was young.
sent.trans: 曾经的天真，曾经的苦涩。再见了，懵懂小时候。
